favourite.article: Hallelujah! Jesus is Lord!.---. Now the God of peace will crush Satan under your feet shortly. The grace of our Lord Jesus be with you. (Romans 16:20). Thank You dear Lord, for the victory given to Your Church.

Yes!!! The kingdom of this WORLD has become the kingdom of our LORD and HIS CHRIST!! This shall continually be my confession and my stand for Christ and the Church. Now is come Salvation and Strength and the Kingdom of our God and the Power of HIS Christ!!!
Hallelujah! The Lord is gaining His kingdom!
